name: Conway's Game of Sokoban
description:
Wander through the wild world of Conway's Game of Life, with your trusty Sokoban blocks and targets.

wasd / arrow keys to move
z to undo
r to restart
esc to level select

Some of the levels get quite big, I suggest playing in full screen. Or just skip them, they might run slowly for you. It's okay, have fun!

Life wiki: https://conwaylife.com/wiki/Main_Page

Made with Puzzlescript Plus: https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/index.html

Play an earlier Puzzlescript version here: https://jackkutilek.com/puzzlescript/conways-game-of-sokoban.html

Palette adapted from: https://lospec.com/palette-list/odd-feeling
